project.name: TIE - Technology Integration & Engineering Departmental Hub

data.name: [SFDC-710] Configure hourly invoice sync schedule
data.notes:
Summary
Configure the existing invoice sync to run hourly during business hours (6am–6pm) to push updated Invoice data to reporting tables used by SSRS. This ensures fulfillment and reporting teams have timely visibility into invoice creation and status, replacing the current daily sync schedule to support more responsive operational decision-making ahead of go-live.

Value or Impact

    Improves fulfillment readiness by keeping invoice-driven workflows current throughout the day
    Enhances reporting accuracy and timeliness for operational dashboards and SSRS reports  
    Reduces lag from daily syncs, supporting faster decision-making across Fulfillment and Sales teams
    Affects approximately 10-49 users across multiple departments who rely on invoice data for daily operations

Acceptance Criteria

    Cron job successfully runs hourly between 6am–6pm (business hours only)
    No performance degradation or excessive cost increases from more frequent runs
    Updated invoice data is consistently available in reporting tables used for SSRS and fulfillment dashboards
    Solution verified in sandbox environment before production deployment
    Logging and monitoring configured to notify team of any sync failures
    Coordination completed with Finance team for validation requirements

Technical Details

    Adjust existing scheduled batch/cron job that syncs Invoice data from Salesforce to reporting tables
    Configure hourly cadence during business hours (6am–6pm) replacing current daily schedule
    Implement comprehensive monitoring and alerting for scheduled job failures
    Ensure no material performance or cost regressions under increased execution frequency
    Coordinate implementation with https://app.asana.com/0/profile/1178935386783376 and Finance team
    Note: Validation reports and custom SSRS reports being used during testing; schedule may need adjustment post-deployment

Affected Systems

    Salesforce: Invoice object and scheduled batch/cron job infrastructure
    Reporting data store/tables consumed by SSRS
    SSRS reports and fulfillment dashboards dependent on invoice data
    Monitoring and alerting systems for scheduled jobs
    Integration layer between Salesforce and reporting infrastructure

Next Steps or Analyst Notes

    Previous similar request (SFDC-697/TIE-1680) was cancelled by https://app.asana.com/0/profile/1178935386783376 on Sep 24, 2025 citing scope creep and refactoring concerns
    Current request appears to be resubmission - need clarification on what has changed to make this viable now
    https://app.asana.com/0/profile/1209127958101691 has requested https://app.asana.com/0/profile/1178935386783376 review regarding "Waddle" connection
    Confirmed by https://app.asana.com/0/profile/1210605213270170 this is not SSC Cloud related CRON (separate from CLD-1132)
    Assigned to https://app.asana.com/0/profile/1211080817815794 for technical assessment

----------------------------------------

Original Description (Retained)

Summary

Configure the existing invoice sync to run hourly during business hours (6am–6pm) so updated Invoice data is pushed to reporting tables used by SSRS. This ensures fulfillment and reporting have timely visibility into invoice creation and status ahead of go‑live.

Value

    Improves fulfillment readiness by keeping invoice-driven workflows current throughout the day.
    Enhances reporting accuracy and timeliness for operational dashboards and SSRS reports.
    Reduces lag from daily syncs, supporting faster decision-making across Fulfillment and Sales.

Acceptance Criteria

    Cron job runs hourly between 6am–6pm (business hours).
    No performance or cost issues from more frequent runs.
    Updated invoice data is available in the reporting tables used for SSRS and fulfillment dashboards.
    Verified in sandbox and production before enabling.
    Logging and monitoring notify on any failures.

Technical Requirements

    Adjust the scheduled batch/cron job that syncs Invoice data to reporting tables used by SSRS to an hourly cadence during business hours (6am–6pm).
    Ensure end-to-end validation in sandbox and production, including monitoring/alerting for failures.
    Confirm no material performance/cost regressions under the increased schedule.
    Coordinate implementation and validation with https://app.asana.com/0/profile/1178935386783376 and the Finance team.
    Note: Validation reports and custom SSRS reports are being used during testing; schedule may need adjustment once deployed.

Affected Systems

    Salesforce: Invoice object; scheduled batch/cron job.
    Reporting data store/tables consumed by SSRS.
    SSRS reports and fulfillment dashboards dependent on invoice data.
    Monitoring/alerting for scheduled jobs.

Triage Notes

    Business Priority & Target: "Before go‑live; next release."
    Cross-functional impact: Fulfillment and Sales; Finance coordination requested in the submission.
    Current state: Daily sync; need to move to hourly (business hours).
    Related conversation: Potential overlap with cloud sync was questioned; per https://app.asana.com/0/profile/1210605213270170, this is not an SSC Cloud CRON and the referenced link was private.
    Requester: Dan DeZago (dan.dezago@safetyservicescompany.com)
    Submission: Technical Integration & Engineering Ticket Form — https://form.asana.com/?k=fiideHFJeymhykmEGYMuNg&d=169426931772429

data.name: [TIE-2252] Resolve sales sling connectivity issue
data.notes:
Incident - Degraded Service
Observed Behavior: The sales sling application is not functioning for the OCE (Oregon Correctional Facility), preventing users from dialing out.
Frequency & Scope: This issue was observed this morning.
Common Issue Description: The sales sling application is not syncing properly, affecting the ability to make calls, which is critical for sales operations in the affected department.  

Business Impact: The inability to make calls is significantly impacting sales from the OCE department and the new department in Gilbert.
Systems Affected: Sales sling application.
Workaround: None available at this time.
Common Issue Description: Users are unable to dial out, which is affecting sales operations.

data.name: [TIE-2295] Update Manufacturing Specials Pricing Display
data.notes:
Capabilities or Features

Description of Requested Change:
• Update configuration and details for the "Manufacturing Specials" feature so special pricing and related fields display and apply correctly across manufacturing order flows and downstream reports.

User Story:
• As an operations/product user, I want the Manufacturing Specials configuration updated so that special pricing and details are shown and applied correctly in manufacturing orders and downstream reports.

Success Criteria:
• Manufacturing Specials appear with correct fields and pricing in the UI where specials are used.
• Special pricing is applied correctly in order calculations and appears accurately in reports.
• Smoke tests of related workflows show no regressions after the update.

Common Issue Description:
• Configuration for the Manufacturing Specials function currently does not display or apply special pricing consistently; this request is to correct and validate configuration and reporting behavior.

Related tasks:
• [TIE-2295] Update Manufacturing Specials configuration (Task:1211177449791294)

data.name: [TIE-2297] Update Canada Construction Specials Content
data.notes:
Info Request: We need a bit more detail to proceed effectively. Please add the items marked “missing,” then reply here.

Category: Unclear — please confirm one of the IT Core categories:
• Incident – Revenue Blocking
• Incident – Degraded Service
• Capabilities or Features
• Capabilities Expansion
• Procurement or Licensing
• Security & Permissions
• New Platform / Major Change

What we have:
• Title: "Canada Construction Specials"
• No description, attachments, or assignee. Task was previously completed and reopened.

What’s missing:
• Confirm Category (missing) — specify which IT Core category above applies.
• Clear Description (missing) — concise summary of the request or issue (what needs to change or what is failing).
• Business Impact / Observed Behavior (missing) — who is affected, how many, and what is blocked or degraded.
• Evidence (missing for incidents) — attach a screenshot, error text, log snippet, or provide reproducible steps.
• Success Criteria (missing for capabilities/expansions/features) — at least two acceptance/testable bullets describing how we’ll know the work is successful.
• Quantity & Recipients (missing for procurement) — exact counts and names/roles of recipients if requesting licenses/hardware.
• Supervisor Approval (if applicable) — confirm approval or attach evidence for Procurement or New Platform requests.

How to respond:
• Reply in this task with the requested details (or attach screenshots/logs).
• If any item doesn’t apply, reply “N/A”.

Once updated, we’ll move this task out of “Waiting on Customer” and resume triage. Thank you!

data.name: [TIE-1749] Add Finance Queue and Settings Access in RingCentral Dashboard
data.notes:
Describe the issue or incident:
This is an access and configuration issue within the RingCentral dashboard for Customer Service.

My Customer Service agents also handle Finance queue calls, but the Finance queue is currently not appearing under Queue Details in the CS dashboard.

Additionally, under the three ellipses menu in Queue Details, there is a Settings option that allows selecting additional columns/filters. I do not currently have permissions to adjust these settings, and I need access to make these adjustments.

Who or what is affected:
This impacts my Customer Service team's reporting accuracy and my ability as an admin to properly monitor agent performance across all queues they handle.

Which system, folder, or resource is involved:
RingCentral Admin Portal → Reports → Analytics→ Live Reports → Customer Service Dashboard → Queue Details

Common Issue Description:
Tool & Version: RingCentral Admin Portal → Reports → Analytics→ Live Reports (web version, current production release)

Report Name & Filters: Customer Service Dashboard – Queue Details (Default view, no custom filters currently applied)

Expected vs Actual:

    Expected: Finance queue is displayed alongside Customer Service queue in Queue Details. I can access Settings (three ellipses menu) to select and configure additional columns/filters.
    Actual: Finance queue is not shown in Queue Details. I do not have permissions to adjust visible columns/filters.

Business Context: Having the Finance queue in Queue Details is critical to accurately capture and monitor workload for my CS agents, since they handle both CS and Finance calls.

data.name: [TIE-2293] Request Additional Details for E52
data.notes:
Info Request: We need a bit more detail to proceed effectively. Please add the items marked “missing,” then reply here.

Category: (please indicate which IT Core category this belongs to: Incident – Revenue Blocking / Incident – Degraded Service / Capabilities or Features / Capabilities Expansion / Procurement or Licensing / Security & Permissions / New Platform / Major Change)

What we have: Task titled "[TIE-2293] Provide details for E52". Previous completion history shows this was closed and then reopened for details. No operational description or evidence provided.

What's missing:
• Category (missing) — state which IT Core category to route this ticket to.
• Description (missing) — a concise, actionable description of the issue or request (remove greetings/signatures).
• Impact (missing) — who is affected and the scope/number impacted; if revenue is affected include business impact ($/time/process blocked).
• Evidence or Repro Steps (missing, required for incidents) — attach screenshots, error text, logs, or step-by-step reproduction.
• Requested outcome / Success Criteria (missing for feature/expansion requests) — what does "done" look like (2+ acceptance criteria preferred).
• Supervisor Approval (missing if Procurement or New Platform) — confirm approval or attach approval trail.
• Related tasks (optional) — link any related Asana tasks.

How to respond:
• Reply in this task with the requested details (or attach screenshots/logs). If any item doesn’t apply, say “N/A”.
• If you intended this task to be informational/archival, say so and we will adjust routing.

Once updated, we’ll move this out of “Waiting For Customer” and resume work. Thank you!

subtasks.name: [TIE-2312] Whitelist Sales Sling IPs Completed
subtasks.notes:
Incident – Revenue Blocking

Business Impact

    Downtime on 8/25 for multiple Contractors using Sales Sling in the OCE region; external contractor workflows were blocked until IPs were whitelisted (potential revenue/process disruption for affected contractors).

Systems Affected

    Sales Sling
    OCE contractor integrations / access

Workaround in place

    OCE IT identified the new IP addresses and added them to the whitelist; service was restored mid-day 8/25.

Common Issue Description

    New/changed outbound IP addresses from the Sling service were not whitelisted in OCE, resulting in blocked traffic for contractors that rely on Sling integrations.

data.notes:
Name:
Leslie Onley

Email address:
leslie.onley@safetyservicescompany.com

Which Department are you representing?:
CUST - Client Success

Choose who is MOST impacted by this issue:
Just Me

How many customers or staff does this issue impact?:
50-500

How important is this to your daily work?:
Critical

Select any department that is also impacted.:
CUST - Client Success

How can we help you today?:
IT Core

What type of IT issue are you reporting?:
Security & Permissions

Describe the issue or incident:
This is an access issue. I attempted to set up Outlook on my new Android device, but received the following message:
"Your mobile device is temporarily blocked from accessing content until your administrator grants it access."
I need assistance getting the device approved so I can access my work email.

Who or what is affected?:
Only my user account is affected at this time.

Which system, folder, or resource is involved?:
Outlook / Microsoft Exchange Mobile Access on Android

Which description matches your problem?:
Email Setup & Group Lists

Business Need:
Access to Outlook on my mobile device is essential to stay connected with email and calendar while away from my desk. Timely access supports responsiveness to clients, internal teams, and urgent business matters. This is especially important during travel, after hours, or when working remotely

Mailbox Type:
Outlook

Email Addresses:
Leslie.onley@safetyservicescompany.onmicrosoft.com 

Signature or Policy Requirements:
normal 

What should we call this?:
Leslie O: Outlook access blocked on Android

Additional Context:
Outlook is still active on my old device. Let me know if I need to sign out.

data.name: [TIE-1755] Diagnose and Repair Hardwired Internet Connection
data.notes:
Observed Behavior:
Hardwired internet connection in office at EZSpaces is completely non-functional. User cannot connect to the network through the wall ethernet outlet.

Frequency & Scope:
Connection previously worked but now fails consistently. Issue affects only the hardwired connection in this specific office location. Wi-Fi remains available but is slow, particularly during Premier-level demos.

Screenshots / Logs:
Not provided.

Common Issue Description:
Hardware or Software Configuration - Wired network connectivity failure. Investigation revealed the issue is with wiring infrastructure within the EZSpaces building, requiring facility management attention.

data.name: [TIE-2286] Fix RingSense AI Announcement Issue
data.notes:
Observed Behavior:
RingSense AI note taker is announcing itself on phone calls, making customers aware of the recording. This issue had been previously resolved approximately one month ago but has recurred.

Frequency & Scope:
Issue started again on August 27, 2025. Multiple sales agents affected with customer complaints received.

Screenshot/Logs:
Call example from 8/27/25: https://ringsense.ringcentral.com/calls/31db22e6-5d00-4f88-9a44-33bf84723b1f

Common Issue Description:
RingCentral/RingSense configuration issue where AI note taker announcements are audible to customers during calls, creating negative customer experience and potential compliance concerns.

data.name: [SFDC-1211] Create HSE Manual Builder line items in Salesforce and P2
data.notes:
Request Summary:
Create new line items for "HSE US - Digital Manual Builder" in both Salesforce and P2 systems to support the launch of buildmymanual.com website.

Requester: Ben Gores (ben.gores@safetyservicescompany.com) - FULF Fulfillment
Priority: High - needed ASAP for website launch
Cross-functional impact: Fulfillment, Marketing & Knowledge, Sales

Requirements:

    Add HSE US - Digital Manual Builder line item in Salesforce production environment
    Add corresponding line item in P2 system
    Line items must be active and functional for invoicing and reporting

Business Context:
This is required for Finance to properly invoice and report on manuals sold through the new buildmymanual.com website. The Fulfillment manager is coordinating with Marketing and Finance teams for the website launch.

Acceptance Criteria:

    HSE US - Digital Manual Builder line item is active in SF
    HSE US - Digital Manual Builder line item is active in P2
    Line items are configured for proper invoicing and reporting

Urgency: Blocking website launch - needs immediate attention

----------------------------------------

Original Form Submission:
Name:
Ben Gores

Email address:
ben.gores@safetyservicescompany.com

Which Department are you representing?:
FULF - Fulfillment

Choose who is MOST impacted by this issue:
Entire Department or Team

How many customers or staff does this issue impact?:
2-9

How important is this to your daily work?:
High

Select any department that is also impacted.:
FULF - Fulfillment
MKTG - Marketing & Knowledge
SALE - Sales

How can we help you today?:
Salesforce

What kind of Salesforce request is this?:
SFDC - Admin Support

Configuration Request:
I need new line items for HSE US - Digital Manual Builder entered into SF and P2

Target Users & Environment:
A new line item needs to be added in SF and P2 based on the information provided to the Smart sheet. This should be in the production environment. 

Urgency & Timing:
As soon as possible. This is needed to launch the buildmymanual.com website. 

User Story:
As the Fulfillment manager I am working with Marketing and Finance to launch the buildmymanual.com website. In order for Finance to invoice and report on the manuals sold on the website this product needs its own line item in SF and Penguin. 

Acceptance Criteria:
The HSE US - Digital Manual Builder line item is active in SF and P2. 

What should we call this?:
HSE Manual Builder line Items needed in SF and P2

Additional Context:
This is needed in order to be able to launch the buildmymanual.com website.

data.name: [TIE-1748] Restore RingCentral agent visibility and settings
data.notes:
Name:
Leslie Onley

Email address:
leslie.onley@safetyservicescompany.com

Which Department are you representing?:
CUST - Client Success

Choose who is MOST impacted by this issue:
Entire Department or Team

How many customers or staff does this issue impact?:
2-9

How important is this to your daily work?:
Critical

Select any department that is also impacted.:
CUST - Client Success
FIN - Finance

How can we help you today?:
IT Core

What type of IT issue are you reporting?:
Security & Permissions

Describe the issue or incident:
This is an access and visibility issue within the RingCentral Admin Portal→ Reports→ Analytics →Live Reports → Agent Details, I’ve noticed that Nathaniel Dax Monteverde, Charlyn Olicia, and Leizl Nesperos are not appearing in the agent list. These agents are part of the CSM team. 

Additionally, within that same section, under the three ellipses menu on the right, there is a Settings option that allows selecting additional columns to display. I do not currently have permissions to adjust these settings, and I am requesting access to be able to do so.

Who or what is affected?:
This impacts my ability as an administrator to view complete agent details and configure the live reports dashboard for accurate monitoring of our team. It indirectly impacts reporting accuracy for Customer Service and CSM operations.

Which system, folder, or resource is involved?:
RingCentral Admin Portal → Reports→ Analytics→ Live Reports → Agent Details

Which description matches your problem?:
Reports & Dashboards Help

Tool & Version:
Access permissions / dashboard configuration issue.

Report Name & Filters:
Report: Agent Details in Live Reports
Filters: Default view; no custom filters applied.

Expected vs Actual:
Expected:
All active CSM agents, including Nathaniel Dax Monteverde, Charlyn Olicia, and Leizl Nesperos, appear in the Agent Details list.

I am able to use the Settings menu (three ellipses) to customize visible columns.

Actual:

These three agents are missing from the list.

I do not have permissions to adjust the available columns in Settings.

What should we call this?:
RingCentral agent list and settings access

Additional Context:
Please see attached screenshot for reference. This affects my ability to monitor team performance in real-time and ensure accurate reporting. The missing agents are actively working and should appear in Live Reports. 

———————————————

data.name: [TIE-2247] Restore SSRS Invoice Batching for Fulfillment
data.notes:
Business Impact:
The Invoicing App is unable to batch invoices, preventing the Fulfillment team from processing orders and fulfilling customer requests. This directly blocks revenue generation as orders cannot be completed.

Systems Affected:

    SSRS reporting system
    Invoicing App
    Waddle application (data not pushing from yesterday's sales)

Workaround:
None identified - system is completely non-functional for invoice batching.

Common Issue Description:
SSRS reports for Meeting and Posters are not working, preventing the Invoicing App from batching invoices. The issue appears to be related to Waddle not successfully pushing sales information from yesterday. This started today and is impacting the entire Fulfillment department's ability to process orders.

data.name: [TIE-2290] Grant ScreenConnect Access to Sales Managers
data.notes:
Original Description (preserved):
What You Need: Provide ScreenConnect Access to Sales Managers
Quantity & Recipients: 3
Business Justification: Enable sales managers to provide remote assistance & perform ride alongs
Supervisor Approval: No
Common Issue Description: This request is necessary to support sales managers. Matt Lincoln directly identified this as revenue impacting for the Sales team and wants a solution ASAP.
Additional Context: Security considerations must be addressed before granting Sales users access to ConnectWise. Current roles and permissions are not well-separated, and we need to limit access to prevent unauthorized use of secure resources. We also need to manage the concurrent connections in ScreenConnect, as only 3 users can connect at once.

----------------------------------------

Supplemental TIE Framing (Procurement or Licensing):
• What You Need: Grant ScreenConnect (ConnectWise Control) access for Sales Managers to remotely assist sales agents and conduct ride-alongs.
• Quantity & Recipients: 3 concurrent ScreenConnect users. Accounts have been created for https://app.asana.com/0/profile/1210605074501707, https://app.asana.com/0/profile/1210701781643537, and https://app.asana.com/0/profile/1210024765840547. Please confirm whether https://app.asana.com/0/profile/1207031591185757 also requires access.
• Business Justification: Supports revenue operations by enabling timely remote assistance and training/ride‑alongs for Sales.
• Supervisor Approval: Missing — a named approver (name/title) is required to proceed with permanent access and scope of permissions.
• Common Issue Description: As stated — identified by Matt Lincoln as revenue impacting; needs expedited resolution.
• Security Considerations: Implemented least‑privilege via “Sales Machines” session group; SSC Manager role can view/access only targeted sales machines (no elevated system‑wide permissions). Decision pending on whether to allow unattended access and whether access should be “all sales agents” vs. “direct reports only.”
• Constraints: License allows only 3 concurrent connections; usage must be managed to avoid lockouts.
• Current Status: Invites sent; walkthrough completed on 9/10 with managers; connectivity verified. Awaiting business decisions (access scope, unattended access) and formal supervisor approval to finalize.

Success Criteria:
When the Command Center opens when a new window is opened on a company computer.

Change Safety Zone to Command Center.

data.name: [TIE-2243] Renew Bitdefender Licenses for Security
data.notes:
What You Need:
Renewal of Bitdefender Business Security licenses for 50+ endpoints

Quantity & Recipients:
50+ endpoint licenses for company-wide security protection across all departments

Business Justification:
Bitdefender is critical EDR (Endpoint Detection and Response) security software that protects company machines from malware and cyber threats. The licenses have expired and the system is currently operating in a grace period. Immediate renewal is required to maintain full security protection and compliance with cybersecurity best practices.

Supervisor Approval:
Contact with reseller Zevity Tech has been established. Renewal quote received with 14-day validity period. https://app.asana.com/0/profile/1209127958101691 approval needed for procurement.

Common Issue Description:
Renewal period for Bitdefender passed due to missed communications sent to IT email addresses. Multiple security modules (Firewall, Content Control, Antimalware) have expired but the system remains active in grace period. Contact established with reseller Zevity Tech (helpdesk@zevitytech.com) who provided renewal quote. Product Version: 7.9.25.261 currently installed on 50+ endpoints.

data.name: [TIE-1771] - Customer Service call recordings missing
data.notes:
Name:
Leslie Onley

Email address:
leslie.onley@safetyservicescompany.com

Which Department are you representing?:
CUST - Client Success

Choose who is MOST impacted by this issue:
Entire Department or Team

How many customers or staff does this issue impact?:
500+

How important is this to your daily work?:
Critical

Select any department that is also impacted.:
CUST - Client Success
FULF - Fulfillment
SALE - Sales
STRG - Strategic Growth

How can we help you today?:
IT Core

What type of IT issue are you reporting?:
Incident - Degraded Service

Observed Behavior:
Customer Service department calls are not being recorded in RingCentral as expected. This impacts the ability to review calls for quality assurance, training, and process accuracy.

Frequency & Scope:
Occurs every time for all outbound Customer Service calls. Issue appears to affect the entire Customer Service team (2 agents).

Which description matches your problem?:
Phone or Voicemail

Describe the Call Issue:
Outbound calls not recording 

Device & Location:
Ringcentral and Salesforce 

Tried Troubleshooting:
Reviewed multiple areas in RingCentral admin and user portals to check for alternative ways to access or retrieve the recordings. No alternate recording files or logs found. No local device/network troubleshooting performed, as issue appears to be platform-based.

What should we call this?:
Customer Service call recordings missing

Additional Context:
Customer Service agents handle a high volume of client engagement, coordinating between multiple departments. Lack of call recordings prevents QA review, dispute resolution, and coaching. This is a high-priority issue due to potential compliance, service quality, and operational risks. Recommend urgent investigation into RingCentral settings, user permissions, and recording triggers for the affected lines.

———————————————
